provider.name: singleplatform
provider.attributionText: Disclaimer: Always check with the business for pricing and availability of menu items. SinglePlatform is not responsible for menu or pricing changes, but the information is believed to be accurate when posted. Listing of a menu does not mean that there is any affiliation, endorsement or sponsorship between SinglePlatform and the listed business.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.description: Romaine lettuce, homemade croutons, parmesan cheese, and house caesar dressing.

items.name: Southwestern Grilled Chicken Salad
items.description: Strips of grilled chicken, romaine lettuce, black beans, avocado slices, tortilla strips, cheddar & jack shredded cheese, red bell pepper, tomatoes, and red onions, with house cilantro vinaigrette.

items.name: Fruit Salad
items.description: Chunks of seasonal fresh fruit in to-go container.

items.name: Garden Salad
items.description: Mixed baby greens, red cabbage, cucumbers, carrots, and tomatoes.

items.name: Southwestern Grilled Steak Salad
items.description: Strips of grilled steak, romaine lettuce, black beans, avocado slices, tortilla strips, cheddar & jack shredded cheese, red bell pepper, tomatoes, and red onions, with house cilantro vinaigrette.

items.name: Grilled Chicken Caesar Salad
items.description: Strips of grilled chicken breast, romaine lettuce, homemade croutons, parmesan cheese, and house caesar dressing.

items.name: Soup
items.description: Our daily homemade soup served in plate, or in 16 ounce container to go. glendale garnishes their soup with two cuban crackers; burbank garnishes their soup with a small freshly baked roll.

items.name: Porto's House Salad
items.description: Mixed baby greens, black beans, sliced avocado, tomatoes, cucumbers, and red onions, with mango vinaigrette.

items.name: Soup Bowl
items.description: Our daily homemade soup served in our homemade bread bowl.

items.name: Dinner Plates (Served After 2Pm)
items.description: Rice, black beans, ripened and golden fried plantain slices (maduros) , grilled onions, and choice of chicken, steak, shredded beef (ropa vieja) , or shredded pork (lechon) .

items.name: Chicken Fajita Sandwich
items.description: Strips of grilled chicken, provolone cheese, guacamole, and a zesty vegetable mix, on a french roll.

items.name: Chicken Torta
items.description: Marinated and grilled chicken breast, black bean spread, goat cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, and red onions, on a french round.

items.name: Grilled Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Marinated and grilled chicken breast, provolone cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, dijon mustard, and mayonnaise, on a french round.

items.name: Cubano Sandwich
items.description: Slices of slow roasted pork, ham, swiss cheese, pickles, butter, and mustard and mayonnaise mix on cuban bread.

items.name: Feta Sandwich
items.description: Feta cheese, fresh basil, vine ripened tomatoes, red onions, italian dressing, on a french baguette.

items.name: Ham and Cheese Croissant
items.description: Ham, swiss cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, and mayonnaise on a butter croissant.

items.name: Italian Sub
items.description: Ham, genoa salami, mortadella, mozzarella cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, red onions, and italian dressing, on ciabatta bread.

items.name: Medianoche (Midnight Sandwich)
items.description: Slices of slow roasted pork, ham, swiss cheese, pickles, butter, and mustard and mayonnaise mix on a sweet roll.

items.name: Medianoche Preparada (W/ Croquette)
items.description: Our medianoche sandwich with ham croquettes.

items.name: Pan Con Bistec
items.description: Marinated steak, potato sticks, grilled onions, tomatoes, and mojo (cuban garlic sauce) on cuban bread.

items.name: Pan Con Lechon (Roasted Pork Sandwich)
items.description: Slow roasted pulled pork, grilled onions, and mojo (cuban garlic sauce) , on cuban bread.

items.name: Papa Preparada (Potato Ball Sandwich)
items.description: Potato balls, swiss cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, and mustard and mayonnaise mix on cuban bread.

items.name: Pastrami
items.description: Freshly sliced pastrami, pickles, mustard, and mayonnaise, on a french roll.

items.name: Porto's Veggie
items.description: Roasted eggplant, roasted red bell peppers, and zucchini, with havarti cheese, hummus spread, lettuce, and tomatoes on wheat.

items.name: Ropa Vieja Sandwich
items.description: Traditional cuban style shredded beef, with bell peppers, onions, and tomato sauce on cuban bread.

items.name: Steak Fajita Sandwich
items.description: Strips of grilled steak, provolone cheese, guacamole, and a zesty vegetable mix, on a french roll.

items.name: Steak Torta
items.description: Strips of grilled steak, black bean spread, guacamole, cotija cheese, lettuce, and tomatoes, on a french round.

items.name: Tuna Melt
items.description: Homemade tuna salad, and cheddar cheese, on sourdough bread, grilled.

items.name: Turkey and Cheese Croissant
items.description: Turkey, swiss cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, and mayonnaise on a butter croissant.

items.name: Turkey Melt
items.description: Turkey breast slices, provolone cheese, roasted red bell peppers, onions, tomatoes, mustard, and mayonnaise, on sourdoug bread, grilled.

items.name: Tuna Salad Croissant
items.description: Homemade tuna salad, lettuce, and tomatoes on a butter croissant.

items.name: Chicken Croquette
items.description: Chicken croquettes are made from a mix of ground chicken seasoned with our special blend of herbs and spices, coated in panko bread crumbs, and fried to perfection. can be perfectly accompanied by a side of chipotle dipping sauce (may be purchased separately) .

items.name: Meat Pie (Pastel De Carne)
items.description: A light and flaky puff pastry filled with seasoned ground beef.

items.name: Tuna Puff
items.description: A light and flaky puff pastry filled with tuna salad.

items.name: Chicken Empanada
items.description: Empanada comes from the spanish verb "empanar", meaning to wrap or coat in dough. at porto's bakery our spanish empanadas are made of slow cooked shredded chicken and vegetables stuffed into a soft dough pocket.

items.name: Pork Tamales
items.description: A traditional latin american dish, tamales were eaten as far back as 5000 bc. our cuban style tamales are simply delicious! they are wrapped in a traditional corn husk and are made with a seasoned corn based dough, filled with tender pulled pork and cuban spices.

items.name: Baked Ham and Cheese Croissant
items.description: Croissant filled with ham and swiss cheese baked to perfection.

items.name: Chorizo Pie
items.description: Chorizo pies are made with our empanada dough filled with seasoned pork sausage.

items.name: Potato Ball Tm- Stuffed Potato
items.description: A soft mashed potato ball filled with seasoned ground beef, fried to golden brown.

items.name: Mariquitas (Plantain Chips)
items.description: Homemade plantain chips, lightly salted, with side of cuban garlic sauce (mojo) .

items.name: Ham Croquette
items.description: Our ham croquettes are made from ground ham seasoned with spices, breaded, and flash fried.

items.name: Rellenito
items.description: Sugar coated sweet plantain filled with black beans.

items.name: Cake - Cake Specialty - Cake and Mousses
Cappuccino Mousse Cake 8"
items.description: A layer of chocolate-fudge cake, a layer of chocolate mousse, a layer of white sponge cake, and a layer of cappuccino mousse. finished with a clear glaze marbled with coffee extract.

items.name: Chocolate Raspberry Cake 9"
items.description: Devils food chocolate cake, filled with one layer of raspberry jam, one layer chocolate whip, decorated with chocolate whip and drizzled with chocolate ganache.

items.name: Flourless 9"
items.description: A dense chocolate cake made without any flour. a chocolate lovers' favorite.

items.name: Carrot 9"
items.description: Made with fresh carrots, lots of walnuts and pineapple, topped with cream cheese icing, and surrounded with pecans.

items.name: Chocolate Raspberry Mousse Cake 8"
items.description: One layer of rich chocolate-fudge cake, one layer of white sponge cake, one layer of raspberry mousse, and one layer of chocolate mousse decorated with an assortment of fresh fruits.

items.name: Fresh Strawberry Cheesecake 9"
items.description: New york cheesecake topped with fresh strawberries. finished with strawberry glaze.

items.name: Checkers 8"
items.description: Two layers of white sponge cake, layer of bavarian cream, layer of chocolate mousse, finished with chocolate ganache.

items.name: Cuban Cake 8" Vanilla Custard Filling
items.description: Yellow sponge cake, soaked in a light french brandy syrup. with a vanilla custard filling. decorated with a detail of sugar flowers in either 1) assorted soft colors, 2) pink, or 3) light blue.

items.name: Italian Cheesecake
items.description: Decorated with fresh fruits. thin layers of white-sponge cake soaked with pear brandy, marscapone cheese, and fresh pears.

items.name: Chocolate Grand Marnier Mousse Cake 9"
items.description: Thin layers of chocolate mousse and chiffon cake soaked with grand marnier syrup & a touch of orange marmalade. finished with belgium chocolate ganache.

items.name: Cuban Cake 8" Vanilla Custard & Pineapple Filling
items.description: Yellow sponge cake, soaked in a light french brandy syrup. with pineapple and custard filling. decorated with a detail of sugar flowers in either 1) assorted soft colors, 2) pink, or 3) light blue.

items.name: Lemon Mousse Cake 9"
items.description: Layers of almond financier brushed with yuzu lime gellee and lemon white chocolate mousse.

items.name: Mango Cheesecake 9"
items.description: Traditional cheesecake flavored with mango puree and a layer of yellow sponge cake.

items.name: New York Cheesecake 9"
items.description: Traditional new york style cheesecake finished with sour cream and strawberries.

items.name: Pina Colada Mousse 9"
items.description: Layers of white sponge cake, pina colada mousse, and chunks of pineapple. decorated with toasted coconut.

items.name: Mango Mousse Cake 8"
items.description: Two layers of white sponge cake, and two layers of fresh mango mousse, decorated with fresh fruits.

items.name: Opera 8"X8"
items.description: Almond sponge cake soaked in coffee, layer of chocolate ganache, layer of mocha butter cream. topped with chocolate.

items.name: Red Velvet 9"
items.description: Layers of red velvet cake and cream cheese filling. finished with cream cheese icing. decorated with red velvet crumbs and fresh rose petals.

items.name: Meringue Fruit Torte 10"
items.description: Yellow sponge cake soaked in a light french brandy syrup, with a layer of custard and peaches. topped with meringue. covered with assorted fresh fruits.

items.name: Oreo Cheesecake 9"
items.description: Traditional cheesecake with oreo cookie crust and pieces of oreo cookie.

items.name: Strawberry Shortcake 8"
items.description: Yellow cake, soaked in a light french brandy syrup, with a layer of fresh strawberries/real whipped cream, and a layer of vanilla custard. topped with real whipped cream and surrounded with puff pastry crumbs.

items.name: Milk'n'berrie 8"
items.description: Yellow sponge cake soaked in three-milk sauce, with layers of mixed strawberries, raspberries, blueberries, and blackberries in whipped cream. finished with whipped cream icing and decorated with mixed berries.

items.name: Parisian 9"
items.description: Devils food chocolate cake, layered and decorated with chocolate whipped cream. finished with chocolate shavings.

items.name: Tiramisu 8"
items.description: Thin layers of white-sponge cake (soaked with espresso) and marscapone cheese mousse. finished with a ring of lady fingers, and chocolate shavings.

items.name: White Chocolate Raspberry Cheesecake 9"
items.description: Traditional cheesecake with white chocolate and fresh raspberries.

items.name: Triple Chocolate Mousse 9"
items.description: This cake begins with a layer of chocolate-fudge cake that is topped with a layer of white-chocolate, milk chocolate, and dark chocolate mousse and is decorated with white chocolate shavings.

items.name: Tres Leches 10"
items.description: Yellow sponge cake soaked in three milk sauce. topped with meringue icing.

items.name: Tres Leches 1/4 Sheet
items.description: Yellow sponge cake soaked in three milk sauce. topped with whipped cream.

items.name: Cake - Cakes Speciality - Tarts and Other
Josephine (Senorita)
items.description: Layers of crispy puff pastry lined with custard and real whipped cream, finished with powder sugar.

items.name: Napoleon Dulce De Leche
items.description: Thin, crispy puff pastry layered with dulce de leche custard and real whipped cream.

items.name: Fruit Tart 8"
items.description: Sweet butter pastry shell filled with custard and a thin layer of sponge cake. covered with an assortment of delicious fruits. not available during holidays.

items.name: Rustic Apple Tart 11"
items.description: Crispy butter puff pastry filled with almond custard, covered with fresh sliced apples, topped with cinnamon sugar.
